sections.summary: seeking an education coordinator position with a company that will allow me to fully manage curriculum development, coordinate on the job training opportunities, utilize my communication, organizational, and problem solving skills. highlights microsoft office (word, outlook, excel, powerpoint, publisher, access) teaching strategies gold cda-infants & toddlers maryland child care credential pcs web leadership skills time management skills verbal communication skills organizational skills basic clerical knowledge teamwork skills reliable teaching skills resourcefulness patience responsibility reliability determination multi-tasking
